mapper.select: insert into workout_logs ( calories_burnt, date, duration, intensity, title, uid, workout_type ) values ( #{workoutLog.caloriesBurnt}, #{workoutLog.date}, #{workoutLog.duration}, #{workoutLog.intensity}, #{workoutLog.title}, #{workoutLog.uid}, #{workoutLog.workoutType} ) returning id
mapper.insert:
insert into runs ( distance, duration, index, workout_log_id ) values
(#{run.distance}, #{run.duration}, #{run.index}, #{run.workoutLogId})

insert into exercises ( index, name, reps, sets, weight, workout_log_id ) values
(#{exercise.index}, #{exercise.name}, #{exercise.reps}, #{exercise.sets}, #{exercise.weight}, #{exercise.workoutLogId})
mapper.select: select count(*) as totalWorkouts, sum(duration) as totalDurationInSeconds, floor(avg(duration)) as averageDurationInSeconds from workout_logs where uid = #{userId} group by uid;
